messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a flower county with 15 flower fields. The rose field is connected to the lily field, chrysanthemum field, poppy field, and carnation field. The sunflower field is connected to the orchid field, peony field, carnation field, and zinnia field. The tulip field is connected to the hydrangea field, daffodil field, marigold field, and peony field. The daisy field is connected to the lily field, chrysanthemum field, poppy field, and lavender field. The orchid field is connected to the peony field, carnation field, and zinnia field. The hydrangea field is connected to the daffodil field, marigold field, and lavender field. The lily field is connected to the chrysanthemum field, and poppy field. The peony field is connected to the zinnia field. The daffodil field is connected to the marigold field and lavender field. The chrysanthemum field is connected to poppy field. The carnation field is connected to the zinnia field. The marigold field is connected to the lavender field. You have been told that you can get a bunch of 50 peony flowers for free if you visit peony field and you can get a bunch of 10 lavender flowers for free if you choose to visit lavender field. Now, from the rose field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers? Remember that you can only take one bunch of flowers and only from one field. Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

For example: rose, lily, chryshemum, orchid, zinnia, marigold, tulip, hydrangea, daffodil, poppy, peony, lavender.

##### Note

As you can see in this example, a single turn in the maze is represented by space need to go to the maze to collect a bunch of flowers.

A single maze trip consists of a single space, a bunch of flowers, and the next space.

For example: Rose, lily, chrysanthemum, daisy, sunflower, orchid, zinnia, marigold, tulip, hydra, daffodil, poppy, peony, lav.

If you want to visit peony field, you will have to go to rose field, lily field, chrysanthemum field, daisy field, sunflower field, orch zinnia field, marigold field, tulip field, hydrangea field, daffodil field, poppy field, peony field, and lavender field

You are told that a teleportation portal appears in the poppy field, through which you can teleport to any field one at a time. This means that from the poppy field you can go to any field. Now, from the rose field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers? Remember that you can only take one bunch of flowers and only from one field. Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

assistant:  For example: rose, lily, chrysanthemum, orchid, zinnia, marigold, sunflower, hydrangea, daffodil, poppy, peony, lavender, poppy, sunflower, daffodil, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy, sunflower, hydrangea, marigold, poppy
